title: WHEREAS the Government considers it necessary to by order increase
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by 

the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks Act 2022 (Section 11) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited remediation dwelling damaged use defective concrete block act 2022 (section 11) order 2024

title: WHEREAS the Government considers it necessary to by order increase
heading: In this Order “Act of 2022” means Remediation of Dwellings Damaged
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “Act of 2022” means Remediation of Dwellings Damaged 

by the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks Act 2022.
text_norm: 2 order act 2022 mean remediation dwelling damaged use defective concrete block act 2022

title: WHEREAS the Government considers it necessary to by order increase
heading: 3. The amount referred to -
text_raw:
3. The amount referred to - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

in section 10(3) of the Act of 2022 shall stand increased to 
€462,000, 

in section 10(4)(a) of the Act of 2022 shall stand increased to 
€16,500, 

in section 10(4)(b) of the Act of 2022 shall stand increased to 
€5,500, and 

in section 10(4)(c) of the Act of 2022 shall stand increased to 
€5,500.
text_norm: 3 amount referred - (a) (b) (c) (d) section 10(3) act 2022 shall stand increased eur462 000 section 10(4)(a) act 2022 shall stand increased eur16 500 section 10(4)(b) act 2022 shall stand increased eur5 500 section 10(4)(c) act 2022 shall stand increased eur5 500

title: WHEREAS the Government considers it necessary to by order increase
heading: 4. This Order shall come into operation on the 23rd day of October 2024.
text_raw:
4. This Order shall come into operation on the 23rd day of October 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 October, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
